item.title: How to Shave & Avoid Razor Bumps
item.description:
How to Shave & Avoid Razor Bumps

Are you sick of getting those irritating and insightful razor bumps after you shave? For a guy aiming for the professional look, few things look better than a closely well shaven gentleman in a suit. As great as you may look on the first day, the risk of skin irritations showing up is greatly increased based on the way you shave.

item.title: The Day I Occupied Myself
item.description:
The Day I Occupied Myself

Friday, August 8, 2014 Today is the day I decided to occupy myself, instead of spending the rest of my time in an occupation. Just 24 hours ago, I was a manager of a sales force at the top company in its industry, spending over 65 hours a week on a rotating schedule, making someone else's empire stronger.
